title: Sales of state lotteries in the U.S. 2009 to 2016
summary: In general Sales in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Sales in billion U.S. dollars, about 80.55 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 58.82 was reached at Year 2010
